definition: Chen Yunlin (1941-), chairman of PRC Association for Relations Across the Taiwan Straits (ARATS) 海峽兩岸關係協會|海峡两岸关系协会[Hai3 xia2 Liang3 an4 Guan1 xi5 Xie2 hui4] (2008-2013)
surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: The DPP's chairwoman , Tsai Ing-wen, says her party will dog Mr Chen wherever he goes.
sentences.chinese: 民進黨主席蔡英文說，民進黨人會一直尾隨陳雲林。

sentences.english: During the meeting, Chen notably did not refer to Mr.
sentences.chinese: 在會議中陳雲林並未稱馬爲總統。
